name: Furen's Armor
tooltip:
Furen's Armor

Here's your armor, <name>.  This will stand up to the strongest assaults or my name isn't Furen Longbeard!

And I have to thank you.  I learned a lot while working with the materials you brought me.  I think I'll have another breakthrough one day!

I'm going to send what I learned to other blacksmiths of the Alliance.

I'll tell them you were a big help, and maybe they'll want to return the favor.
